item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1425; 06:47PM; 9300 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIf4p2; Palms; KNOCKDOWN: 22 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending to the exposed structure (two story apartment building). No further details.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E294 E43 E58 E94 RA58 T92 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1425; 06:27PM; 9300 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIf4p2; Palms; One story (vacant) single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E43 E94 RA58 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1458; 06:41PM; 10982 W Roebling Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IREVF2; #Westwood; Twenty-two firefighters responded to the four-story apartment building with fire in one fourth floor unit. It took firefighters 20 minutes to extinguish the fire, confining the flames to the unit of origin. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E237 E292 E71 RA37 RA837 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Sinking Vessel; INC#1167; 03:27PM; 701 S Shore Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZDKwF1; #Wilmington; Firefighters arrived to find a vessel that had taken on several feet (or more) of water and was struggling to stay afloat. Firefighters have located at least a couple of holes and plugged them, while aggressively dewatering the vessel. Crews have made great progress and are optimistic about keeping the vessel on the surface. They will continue the dewatering operation until they have evacuated as much water as possible. Unknown if the recent storms compounded the problem or not. Nothing further.; FS 49; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC706 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT4 E112 E238 E38 T38; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#0948; 02:00PM; WB 101 Fwy x Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CU2OId; #ValleyVillage; Firefighters made sure the vehicle was stable and assisted one patient out, able to extricate them without the need for hydraulic tools. Three patients were transported: one adult male in fair condition, one adult female in serious condition, and one young child (possibly infant, gender and exact age unknown) in grave condition. CHP Log #1412. Nothing further.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E60 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA76 RA86 RA89 T78 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0948; 01:28PM; WB 101 Fwy x Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CU2OId; #ValleyVillage; Three-vehicle traffic collision with one overturned and three patients. One person is trapped and firefighters are working to extricate them. Additional update will follow when more information becomes available.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E60 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA76 RA86 RA89 T78 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Tree Down with Gas Leak 01/15/2023 INC#1614

item.description: Tree Down with Gas Leak; INC#1614; 10:15PM; 3084 N Belden Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CPUMQC; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters responded to find a large tree down, with a ruptured gas line and wires down (power lines). Firefighters shut down gas and water to the home, which only sustained minor damage. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. DWP and SoCalGas have been notified and are responding. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E82 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA803 RA82 T27 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1545; 09:29PM; 8314 N Stephen Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZFZDhe; #WestHills; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story home with a smell of smoke in the air. Upon making entry, a contents fire involving a Christmas tree was located and extinguished, but had burned through part of the floor. It took the first 18 firefighters 22 minutes from the time of alarm to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E305 RA105 T105; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1211; 05:41PM; 3950 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J8Iuaf; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; The first twenty LAFD Firefighters quickly mounted a coordinated attack, sending crews interior with hose lines and to the roof to provide vertical ventilation on what has been updated to a two-story O-shaped center hallway apartment building. It took 16 minutes to extinguish the flames, confining it to just the unit of origin (and attic space directly above). Firefighters protected the adjacent units on either side of the fire unit. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E294 E34 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1211; 05:25PM; 3950 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J8Iuaf; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; Two-story garden-style apartment building with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E294 E68 E94 RA94 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
